name: 泡菜
description: 一种传统的四川开胃菜，将蔬菜在调味盐水中发酵，口味酸辣爽口。
description_en: A traditional Sichuan appetizer made by fermenting vegetables in seasoned brine, giving them a tangy and spicy flavor.

name: 水煮鱼
description: 经典的四川菜肴，鱼片在充满辣椒和花椒的麻辣汤中煮制，鱼肉鲜嫩。
description_en: A classic Sichuan dish featuring tender slices of fish poached in a spicy and numbing broth filled with chili peppers and Sichuan peppercorns.

name: 香辣牛蛙
description: 牛蛙肉与香辣酱炒制，常伴有辣椒和香料，口感独特。
description_en: Bullfrog meat stir-fried with a fragrant and spicy sauce, often featuring chili peppers and aromatic spices.

name: 毛血旺
description: 以鸭血、毛肚等食材为主料的麻辣火锅，味道鲜香麻辣。
description_en: A spicy hot pot dish featuring duck blood, tripe, and other ingredients, with a savory and numbing flavor.

name: 水煮牛肉
description: 嫩滑的牛肉片在麻辣的汤汁中煮制，香气四溢。
description_en: Tender slices of beef poached in a spicy and numbing broth, releasing a rich aroma.

name: 水煮肉片
name_en: Boiled Pork Slices in Chili Oil
description: 薄切猪肉在麻辣汤汁中煮制，鲜香辛辣。
description_en: Thinly sliced pork poached in a spicy and numbing broth, offering a savory and hot flavor.

name: 香辣虾
description: 鲜虾与香辣酱炒制，味道鲜美辛辣。
description_en: Fresh shrimp stir-fried with a spicy and fragrant sauce, offering a delicious and hot flavor.

name: 辣子鸡
description: 鸡肉与大量辣椒和花椒炒制，香脆麻辣。
description_en: Chicken stir-fried with a large amount of chili peppers and Sichuan peppercorns, resulting in a crispy and numbing spiciness.

name: 香辣肥肠
description: 猪肥肠与香辣酱炒制，口感丰富麻辣。
description_en: Pork intestines stir-fried with a spicy and fragrant sauce, offering a rich and numbing flavor.

name: 豆花
description: 嫩滑的豆腐配以特制的调料，口感细腻。
description_en: Silky tofu served with special seasonings, offering a delicate texture.

name: 蒜泥白肉
description: 薄切猪肉配以蒜泥和特制酱料，鲜香微辣。
description_en: Thinly sliced pork served with garlic paste and special sauces, offering a savory and mildly spicy flavor.

name: 回锅肉
description: 煮熟后再炒制的猪肉片，香气浓郁。
description_en: Pork slices first boiled and then stir-fried, resulting in a rich aroma.

name: 鱼香肉丝
description: 猪肉丝配以鱼香酱料，酸甜辛辣。
description_en: Shredded pork served with Yu Xiang sauce, offering a sweet, sour, and spicy flavor.

name: 鸡杂
description: 多种鸡内脏炖煮，香辣可口。
description_en: Various chicken offal stewed in a spicy broth, offering a flavorful taste.

name: 麻婆豆腐
description: 嫩豆腐与牛肉末在麻辣酱汁中煮制，鲜香麻辣。
description_en: Silky tofu cooked with ground beef in a spicy and numbing sauce, offering a savory and hot flavor.

name: 麻辣鸭血
description: 鸭血与蔬菜在麻辣汤汁中煮制，鲜香麻辣。
description_en: Duck blood cooked with vegetables in a spicy and numbing broth, offering a fresh and hot flavor.

name: 烤鸭
description: 北京传统名菜，以外脆里嫩的鸭肉著称，常搭配荷叶饼、葱和甜面酱。
description_en: A traditional Beijing dish famous for its crispy skin and tender meat, typically served with thin pancakes, scallions, and sweet bean sauce.

name: 炸酱面
description: 以面条拌以黄豆酱和炒制的肉末，搭配黄瓜丝等配料。
description_en: Noodles served with soybean paste and stir-fried minced pork, accompanied by cucumber slices and other toppings.

name: 豆汁
description: 北京传统饮品，味道独特，有酸味，通常搭配焦圈食用。
description_en: A traditional Beijing beverage with a unique sour flavor, often paired with crispy fried rings (Jiao Quan).

name: 涮羊肉
description: 北京冬季常见的火锅料理，羊肉片在沸腾的锅中涮熟后蘸酱食用。
description_en: A popular winter dish in Beijing, featuring thinly sliced lamb cooked in a boiling pot and dipped in sauces.

name: 卤煮
description: 以猪肠、肺等下水为主料，搭配豆腐和蒜汁，味道浓郁。
description_en: A hearty stew made with pork intestines, lungs, tofu, and garlic sauce, offering a rich flavor.

name: 芥末墩
description: 以芥末和醋腌制白菜，味道辛辣酸爽，是一道北京特色凉菜。
description_en: A Beijing-style cold dish made with cabbage pickled in mustard and vinegar, offering a spicy and tangy flavor.

name: 京酱肉丝
name_en: Beijing Shredded Pork in Sweet Bean Sauce
description: 猪肉丝炒制后淋上京酱，搭配豆皮或荷叶饼食用，味道鲜美。
description_en: Shredded pork stir-fried and coated with sweet bean sauce, typically served with tofu skin or pancakes.

name: 炒肝
description: 猪肝与大肠一起煮制成汤，口感浓郁，是北京传统早点之一。
description_en: A traditional Beijing breakfast dish featuring pork liver and intestines cooked into a thick soup.

name: 烙饼卷带鱼
description: 将酥软入味的带鱼与烙饼一起卷食，是一道家常北京菜。
description_en: Braised hairtail with a soft texture, rolled with pancakes, is a classic Beijing home-style dish.

name: 焦圈
description: 一种北京特色小吃，外酥内软，常与豆汁搭配。
description_en: A Beijing specialty snack, crispy on the outside and soft inside, often paired with fermented mung bean juice.

name: 豆腐乳
description: 一种大豆制品，经过发酵后味道浓郁，常作为佐餐小菜。
description_en: A soybean product fermented for a rich flavor, commonly served as a side dish.

name: 素鸡
description: 以豆腐皮卷制成的仿荤菜，口感嫩滑，是素食者的佳品。
description_en: A mock meat dish made from tofu skin, offering a tender texture, perfect for vegetarians.

name: 豆腐脑
description: 用大豆制成的嫩豆腐，配以咸味或甜味调料。
description_en: A tender tofu dish made from soybeans, served with savory or sweet toppings.

name: 油炸豆腐
description: 外酥里嫩的油炸豆腐，可蘸酱食用或入菜。
description_en: Crispy on the outside and tender inside, fried tofu can be dipped in sauce or added to dishes.

name: 酱香豆腐
description: 豆腐经过酱油和香料炖煮，味道鲜美入味。
description_en: Tofu braised with soy sauce and spices, offering a flavorful taste.

name: 麻辣豆腐
description: 豆腐与辣椒和花椒一起炒制，口感麻辣鲜香。
description_en: Tofu stir-fried with chili peppers and Sichuan peppercorns, delivering a spicy and numbing flavor.

name: 豆腐羹
description: 以嫩豆腐为主料，搭配蔬菜煮制而成的清淡汤品。
description_en: A light soup made with tender tofu and vegetables.

name: 豆豉蒸排骨
name_en: Steamed Pork Ribs with Fermented Black Beans
description: 排骨搭配豆豉蒸制，豆豉的香味渗入肉中，味道浓郁。
description_en: Pork ribs steamed with fermented black beans, infusing the meat with rich flavors.

name: 豆瓣鱼
name_en: Fish with Fermented Broad Bean Paste
description: 以豆瓣酱为主要调料的鱼类菜肴，味道浓郁鲜香。
description_en: A fish dish flavored with fermented broad bean paste, offering a rich and savory taste.

name: 豆腐锅
description: 以豆腐为主料的火锅，搭配多种蔬菜和酱料，清淡可口。
description_en: A hot pot dish with tofu as the main ingredient, paired with various vegetables and sauces.

name: 北京泡菜
description: 一种传统的四川开胃菜，将蔬菜在调味盐水中发酵，口味酸辣爽口。
description_en: A traditional Sichuan appetizer made by fermenting vegetables in seasoned brine, giving them a tangy and spicy flavor.

name: 红烧牛肉盖饭
description: 以嫩滑的红烧牛肉和香喷喷的米饭为主，口感丰富。
description_en: A flavorful rice bowl topped with tender braised beef and fragrant rice.

name: 咖喱鸡盖饭
description: 以浓郁咖喱酱烹制的鸡肉和米饭，搭配蔬菜更添风味。
description_en: A hearty rice bowl featuring chicken cooked in a rich curry sauce, served with vegetables.

name: 鱼香茄子盖饭
description: 鱼香风味的茄子搭配米饭，酸甜辛辣。
description_en: A sweet, sour, and spicy rice bowl topped with Yu Xiang-style eggplant.

name: 照烧鸡腿盖饭
description: 酱香浓郁的照烧鸡腿配上蒸米饭，是一道经典的中日结合菜。
description_en: A classic fusion dish of tender teriyaki chicken served with steamed rice.

name: 麻婆豆腐盖饭
description: 经典麻婆豆腐配上热腾腾的米饭，麻辣鲜香。
description_en: A classic Mapo Tofu dish served over hot rice, with a spicy and numbing flavor.

name: 黑椒牛肉盖饭
description: 香辣黑椒牛肉搭配米饭，是一道受欢迎的快餐菜肴。
description_en: A popular quick meal with spicy black pepper beef served over rice.

name: 宫保鸡丁盖饭
description: 经典川菜宫保鸡丁，配上白米饭，麻辣开胃。
description_en: A classic Sichuan dish, Kung Pao Chicken, served with white rice, offering a spicy and tangy flavor.

name: 蒜蓉虾盖饭
description: 鲜虾炒蒜蓉，配上热腾腾的白米饭，美味十足。
description_en: Fresh shrimp stir-fried with garlic, served with hot steamed rice, offering a rich flavor.

name: 豆豉蒸排骨盖饭
name_en: Steamed Pork Ribs with Black Bean Sauce Rice Bowl
description: 豆豉蒸排骨与米饭的绝佳搭配，鲜香可口。
description_en: Tender pork ribs steamed with black bean sauce, served over rice for a delightful meal.

name: 咕噜肉盖饭
name_en: Sweet and Sour Pork Rice Bowl
description: 酸甜可口的咕噜肉搭配米饭，是一道经典粤菜。
description_en: A classic Cantonese dish of sweet and sour pork served over rice.

name: 素什锦盖饭
description: 多种蔬菜炒制，搭配米饭，健康又美味。
description_en: A healthy and delicious rice bowl topped with stir-fried mixed vegetables.

name: 豆花
description: 嫩滑的豆腐配以特制的调料，口感细腻。
description_en: Silky tofu served with special seasonings, offering a delicate texture.

name: 手切羊肉
description: 优质羊肉手工切片，适合涮火锅，口感鲜嫩。
description_en: High-quality lamb hand-sliced for hot pot, offering a tender and fresh flavor.

name: 毛肚
description: 牛毛肚切片，涮火锅时易入味，口感爽脆。
description_en: Sliced beef tripe for hot pot, known for its crisp texture and flavor absorption.

name: 虾滑
description: 由新鲜虾肉制成的虾滑，适合火锅料理。
description_en: Fresh shrimp paste made from minced shrimp, perfect for hot pot.

name: 豆腐皮
description: 薄薄的豆腐皮，涮火锅时吸满汤汁，清香可口。
description_en: Thin tofu skin for hot pot, soaking up broth and providing a delicate taste.

name: 鱼丸
description: 弹性十足的鱼丸，火锅必备食材。
description_en: Bouncy fish balls, a must-have ingredient for hot pot.

name: 肥牛卷
description: 切薄的肥牛肉卷，适合火锅，鲜嫩多汁。
description_en: Thinly sliced fatty beef rolls, ideal for hot pot, tender and juicy.

name: 金针菇
description: 细长的金针菇，涮火锅时味道鲜美。
description_en: Long enoki mushrooms, delicious when cooked in hot pot.

name: 土豆片
description: 土豆切片，适合火锅，口感绵软入味。
description_en: Thinly sliced potatoes for hot pot, soft and flavorful.

name: 午餐肉
description: 火锅常见配料，咸香可口。
description_en: A popular hot pot ingredient, savory and flavorful.

name: 鸭血
description: 鸭血块在火锅中煮熟后口感滑嫩。
description_en: Duck blood cubes, smooth and tender after cooking in hot pot.

name: 鹌鹑蛋
description: 小巧可爱的鹌鹑蛋，涮火锅时十分美味。
description_en: Cute and tasty quail eggs, a delightful addition to hot pot.

name: 西红柿炒鸡蛋
description: 家常菜的经典之一，将西红柿与鸡蛋炒制成香浓可口的一道菜。
description_en: A classic home-style dish featuring stir-fried tomatoes and eggs, offering a savory and tangy flavor.

name: 青椒炒肉丝
description: 细切的猪肉与青椒同炒，口感鲜嫩，风味十足。
description_en: Thinly sliced pork stir-fried with green peppers, offering a tender and flavorful experience.

name: 蒜蓉空心菜
description: 以空心菜为主料，加入蒜蓉炒制，清香爽口。
description_en: Water spinach stir-fried with minced garlic, offering a light and refreshing taste.

name: 辣炒鸡丁
description: 鸡肉丁与辣椒同炒，香辣入味。
description_en: Diced chicken stir-fried with chili peppers, packed with spicy flavor.

name: 杏鲍菇炒牛肉
name_en: Stir-fried Beef with King Oyster Mushrooms
description: 鲜嫩的牛肉片搭配杏鲍菇，味道鲜美，营养丰富。
description_en: Tender beef slices stir-fried with king oyster mushrooms, offering a savory and nutritious dish.

name: 清炒西葫芦
description: 西葫芦切片清炒，清淡可口。
description_en: Sliced zucchini stir-fried for a light and tasty dish.

name: 豆角炒鸡蛋
description: 鸡蛋与豆角一同炒制，鲜香美味。
description_en: Eggs stir-fried with green beans, offering a fragrant and delicious combination.

name: 土豆片炒肉
description: 薄切土豆片与猪肉同炒，软嫩入味。
description_en: Thinly sliced potatoes stir-fried with pork, delivering a soft and flavorful dish.

name: 韭菜炒虾仁
description: 鲜虾仁与韭菜同炒，鲜香可口。
description_en: Shrimp stir-fried with chives, offering a fresh and fragrant dish.

name: 芹菜炒豆腐
description: 清脆的芹菜搭配豆腐，素食佳品。
description_en: Crispy celery stir-fried with tofu, a delightful vegetarian dish.

name: 木耳炒鸡蛋
description: 木耳与鸡蛋搭配炒制，鲜嫩清香。
description_en: Black fungus stir-fried with eggs, offering a tender and fragrant dish.

name: 小鸡炖蘑菇
description: 鸡肉与鲜蘑菇炖煮入味，香气扑鼻。
description_en: Chicken braised with fresh mushrooms, offering a rich aroma and savory taste.

name: 青椒炒鸡蛋
description: 青椒与鸡蛋搭配炒制，清新可口。
description_en: Eggs stir-fried with green peppers, delivering a light and flavorful dish.

name: 香菇炒肉片
description: 香菇与猪肉片同炒，鲜嫩多汁。
description_en: Shiitake mushrooms stir-fried with pork slices, offering a juicy and tender dish.

name: 荷兰豆炒虾仁
description: 鲜嫩的虾仁搭配清脆的荷兰豆，清新爽口。
description_en: Snow peas stir-fried with shrimp, offering a fresh and crunchy dish.

name: 黄瓜炒肉片
description: 清新的黄瓜片与猪肉片炒制，口感清爽。
description_en: Cucumber slices stir-fried with pork, offering a refreshing and savory flavor.

name: 菜花炒牛肉
description: 菜花与牛肉同炒，营养丰富，风味独特。
description_en: Cauliflower stir-fried with beef, offering a nutritious and flavorful dish.

name: 西兰花炒虾仁
description: 西兰花与虾仁搭配炒制，口感清脆鲜美。
description_en: Broccoli stir-fried with shrimp, offering a crisp and delicious taste.

name: 尖椒炒土豆丝
description: 土豆丝搭配尖椒清炒，微辣可口。
description_en: Potato strips stir-fried with chili peppers, offering a slightly spicy and savory flavor.

name: 胡萝卜炒鸡蛋
description: 胡萝卜片与鸡蛋搭配炒制，清甜美味。
description_en: Carrot slices stir-fried with eggs, offering a sweet and tasty dish.

name: 干炒牛河
description: 粤菜经典主食，以牛肉和河粉干炒而成，香气扑鼻，口感滑嫩。
description_en: A classic Cantonese dish made with stir-fried rice noodles and beef, known for its fragrant aroma and smooth texture.

name: 豉汁蒸排骨
name_en: Steamed Pork Ribs with Black Bean Sauce
description: 用黑豆酱调味的蒸排骨，鲜嫩多汁，广式点心中的经典菜品。
description_en: Tender and juicy pork ribs steamed with black bean sauce, a classic dish in Cantonese dim sum.

name: 白切鸡
description: 粤菜经典凉菜，鸡肉鲜嫩多汁，搭配酱油或姜葱蘸料食用。
description_en: A classic Cantonese cold dish featuring tender and juicy chicken, served with soy sauce or ginger scallion dipping sauce.

name: 叉烧包
description: 经典广式点心，松软的包子内填满甜美多汁的叉烧馅料。
description_en: A classic Cantonese dim sum, featuring fluffy buns filled with sweet and savory BBQ pork.

name: 艇仔粥
description: 广式特色粥品，以鱼片、虾仁和香葱等配料熬制而成，口感鲜美。
description_en: A Cantonese specialty congee made with fish slices, shrimp, and scallions, offering a delightful and savory flavor.

name: 椒盐濑尿虾
description: 濑尿虾炸制酥脆后洒上椒盐，外酥内嫩，风味独特。
description_en: Crispy fried mantis shrimp seasoned with salt and pepper, offering a crunchy exterior and tender interior.

name: 虾饺
description: 广式点心代表之一，薄透的外皮包裹鲜美的虾仁，口感Q弹。
description_en: A hallmark of Cantonese dim sum, featuring translucent wrappers encasing juicy shrimp fillings with a bouncy texture.

name: 蜜汁叉烧
description: 甜美多汁的叉烧，以蜂蜜和酱料腌制后烤制而成，是粤菜经典代表。
description_en: Juicy and sweet BBQ pork marinated with honey and seasonings, a classic representation of Cantonese cuisine.

name: 云吞面
description: 粤式传统面食，薄皮鲜虾云吞配上劲道的面条和鲜美的汤底。
description_en: A traditional Cantonese noodle dish featuring shrimp wontons with chewy noodles and a flavorful broth.

name: 椰汁马蹄糕
description: 清爽香甜的甜品，以椰汁和马蹄粉制成，晶莹剔透，口感Q弹。
description_en: A refreshing and sweet dessert made with coconut milk and water chestnut flour, translucent and bouncy in texture.

name: 肠粉
description: 广式早餐或点心，薄滑的米粉卷内包裹虾仁、叉烧等馅料，淋上酱油提味。
description_en: A Cantonese breakfast or dim sum dish with silky rice noodle rolls filled with shrimp, BBQ pork, or other fillings, topped with soy sauce.

name: 咸煎饼
description: 广式小吃，用面团包裹馅料后油炸，外脆内嫩，馅料咸香可口。
description_en: A Cantonese snack made by frying dough filled with savory ingredients, crispy on the outside and tender inside.

name: 烧卖
description: 广式点心经典，糯米、猪肉或虾仁制成，皮薄馅丰，香气扑鼻。
description_en: A classic Cantonese dim sum made with glutinous rice, pork, or shrimp, featuring a thin wrapper and aromatic filling.

name: 荷叶糯米鸡
description: 糯米包裹鸡肉、香菇等食材，用荷叶包裹后蒸熟，荷叶香气渗入米饭中。
description_en: Sticky rice filled with chicken, mushrooms, and other ingredients, wrapped in lotus leaves and steamed for a fragrant aroma.

name: 豉油鸡
description: 整鸡以酱油为主料卤制，皮滑肉嫩，酱香浓郁，经典粤菜。
description_en: A whole chicken braised in soy sauce, offering tender meat and a rich, savory flavor, a classic Cantonese dish.

name: 金银蛋芥菜汤
name_en: Preserved Egg and Salted Egg Mustard Greens Soup
description: 用皮蛋、咸蛋和芥菜熬制而成，口感清香独特，营养丰富。
description_en: A nutritious soup made with preserved eggs, salted eggs, and mustard greens, offering a refreshing and unique taste.

name: 煲仔饭
description: 以砂锅焖煮的米饭，配以腊肠、排骨等配料，米饭吸收锅巴的香气。
description_en: Rice cooked in a clay pot with ingredients like sausage and ribs, absorbing the aromatic flavors of the crispy rice crust.

name: 萝卜糕
description: 广式点心，以白萝卜丝、糯米粉等蒸制后煎香，外焦里嫩。
description_en: A Cantonese dim sum made with shredded radish and rice flour, steamed and pan-fried for a crispy exterior and tender interior.

name: 避风塘炒蟹
description: 以香脆的蒜蓉和辣椒炒制的蟹，香气扑鼻，风味浓郁。
description_en: Crab stir-fried with crispy garlic and chili, offering a fragrant and rich flavor, inspired by Hong Kong's typhoon shelters.

name: 煎饼果子
description: 用面糊摊成薄饼，加入鸡蛋、葱花和炸果子，卷成美味小吃。
description_en: A thin pancake made from batter, filled with egg, scallions, and fried dough sticks, rolled into a delicious snack.

name: 驴打滚
description: 以糯米面制成的甜点，外裹豆沙，撒上黄豆粉，香甜软糯。
description_en: A sweet snack made of glutinous rice flour, filled with red bean paste, and coated with soybean powder, sweet and soft.

name: 糖葫芦
description: 传统小吃，将山楂串成串后裹上糖衣，酸甜可口。
description_en: A traditional snack made by coating skewered hawthorn berries in a sugar glaze, offering a sweet and tangy taste.

name: 油茶
description: 用油炒面粉后加入水和调料煮成的传统早餐饮品，浓香四溢。
description_en: A traditional breakfast drink made by frying flour in oil, then cooking it with water and seasonings, rich and aromatic.

name: 炸酱夹馍
description: 酥脆的馍夹入炸酱和配菜，是一道风味十足的街头小吃。
description_en: A crispy bun stuffed with soybean paste and vegetables, a flavorful street snack.

name: 山楂糕
description: 以山楂果为主料制作的果冻状糕点，酸甜适口。
description_en: A jelly-like dessert made from hawthorn fruits, offering a sweet and tangy taste.

name: 炸蝎子
description: 一种传统北京小吃，将新鲜的蝎子裹面糊油炸而成，香脆独特。
description_en: A traditional Beijing snack made by frying fresh scorpions in batter, crispy and unique in flavor.

name: 冰糖葫芦
description: 在糖葫芦的基础上加入冰糖制作，糖衣更厚，口感更加香甜。
description_en: A variation of candied hawthorn with a thicker rock sugar coating, offering a sweeter taste.

name: 鸡丝凉面
description: 凉拌面条配以鸡丝、黄瓜丝和花生酱，清爽又美味。
description_en: Cold noodles served with shredded chicken, cucumber strips, and peanut sauce, refreshing and tasty.

name: 京式驴肉火烧
description: 酥脆的火烧夹入酱香驴肉，是一道独具地方特色的美味。
description_en: A crispy bun stuffed with savory donkey meat, a unique and delicious local snack.
